00075     virtual int64_t get_total_entries() {
00076       boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00077       int64_t total = m_cell_cache->get_total_entries();
00078       if (m_immutable_cache)
00079         total += m_immutable_cache->get_total_entries();
00080       if (!m_in_memory) {
00081         for (size_t i=0; i<m_stores.size(); i++)
00082           total += m_stores[i]->get_total_entries();
00083       }
00084       return total;
00085     }
00086 
00087     void update_schema(SchemaPtr &schema_ptr, Schema::AccessGroup *ag);
00088 
00089     void lock() { m_mutex.lock(); m_cell_cache->lock(); }
00090     void unlock() { m_cell_cache->unlock(); m_mutex.unlock(); }

00101     int64_t purgeable_index_memory(uint64_t access_counter) {
00102       int64_t total = 0;
00103       for (size_t i=0; i<m_stores.size(); i++)
00104         total += m_stores[i]->purgeable_index_memory(access_counter);
00105       return total;
00106     }
